entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Dorion
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:10 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -20.5°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with drizzle in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
